body_html:
If you have a resource URI, I think you can use:

let uri = Services.io.newURI(resourceURIStringSpec)
let fileOrJarURI = Services.io.getProtocolHandler("resource").QueryInterface(Ci.nsISubstitutingProtocolHandler).resolveURI(uri);

https://dxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/netwerk/protocol/res/nsISubstitutingProtocolHandler.idl#38-45
